rules.natural: The show administrator is authorized for the plant demonstration or the show administrator is authorized for the skill workshop.
Whenever the plant demonstration is scheduled for day one, the main hall is stage ready.
Under the condition that the plant demonstration is scheduled for day one, a judge is assigned to the plant demonstration.
Either the plant demonstration is scheduled for day one or the skill workshop is scheduled for day one.
Given that the skill workshop is scheduled for day one, it is approved.
Provided the main hall is stage ready, the setup for the plant demonstration is complete.
A completed setup for the plant demonstration is a sufficient condition for the plant demonstration to be approved.
Whenever the show administrator is verified, the expo show is successful.
If the show administrator is authenticated, then the show administrator is verified.
Under the condition that a biometric check is performed on the show administrator, the show administrator is authenticated.
There is a system lockdown at the venue or it is not the case that there is a manual override on the access panel.
Provided that the show administrator is authorized for the skill workshop, the expo show is successful.
The moisture sensor being triggered implies the light sensor is triggered.

If the light sensor is triggered, then given that the expo show not being successful implies the emergency protocol is not active for the plant demonstration, an evacuation alert is issued for the audience.
If there is a schedule conflict for the plant demonstration, then a reschedule is approved for the plant demonstration.
A schedule conflict for the plant demonstration implies it is not the case that a reschedule is approved for the plant demonstration.
The electronic device having power turned on for the irrigation system implies it has power turned on for the lighting system.
Given that the plant demonstration is broadcast live, then if it is scheduled for day one, it is approved.
An encrypted feed stream implies the plant demonstration is broadcast live.
If the plant demonstration exhibit is open, then the plant demonstration is approved.
The skill workshop exhibit being open is a sufficient condition for the skill workshop to be approved.
Attendees are present in the main hall or attendees are present in the workshop room.
Provided attendees are present in the workshop room, then either the plant demonstration exhibit is open or the skill workshop exhibit is open.

The venue being compliance certified implies that if it has been safety inspected, then if attendees are present in the main hall, either the plant demonstration exhibit is open or the skill workshop exhibit is open.
A protocol override for the plant demonstration implies the emergency protocol is not active for the plant demonstration.
Either a manual evacuation is performed for the audience, or if the expo show is not successful then there is a protocol override for the plant demonstration.
The alarm being sounded at the venue implies the alarm strobe is active at the venue.
Live media coverage implies there is recorded media coverage.
Either there is live media coverage, or if the alarm strobe is active at the venue then an evacuation alert is issued for the audience.

The irrigation system being operational implies that either the electronic device has power turned on for the climate control, or if it has power turned on for the lighting system then provided the show administrator is authorized for the plant demonstration, the expo show is successful.
Provided the plant demonstration is approved, the expo show is successful.
If the skill workshop is approved, then the expo show is successful.
If it is not the case that a power failure at the venue implies the generator backup is active, then there is a critical failure of the show.
If it is not the case that a judge being assigned to the plant demonstration implies it is approved, then a judge is unavailable for the plant demonstration.
Provided it is not the case that the camera in the main hall being active implies the feed stream is encrypted, then the feed stream is unsecured.

If it is not the case that the failure of a power failure at the venue to imply the generator backup is active implies there is not a critical failure of the show, then there is a schedule conflict for the plant demonstration.
Provided the expo show not being successful implies the emergency protocol is not active for the plant demonstration, then the alarm is sounded at the venue.
If it is not the case that a biometric check is performed on the show administrator, then there is a manual override on the access panel.
The irrigation system not being operational implies the lighting system is operational.
The irrigation system not being operational implies the lighting system is not operational.
Provided the expo show is not successful, the emergency protocol is active for the plant demonstration.
If the expo show is not successful, then there is a power failure at the venue.
